title: Private Spaceships
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 2,083 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1150L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Z and Z1
description: Have you ever dreamed of traveling to space? That dream is now accessible to more people than it's ever been. Private Spaceships describes the recent shift toward a new era of private space flight. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for levels Z and Z1.
highFrequencyWords: aeronautics, capsule, commercial, docking, entrepreneurs, forerunner, inflatable, mission, orbit, re-entry, robotic, spacecraft
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Adjectives                : Identify and use adjectives and the nouns they describe
awareness: Concept Words                : Read and understand number words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
